sentence: how many states in the us does the shortest river run through ?
sentence-with-vars: how many states in the us does the shortest river run through ?
sql: select count ( distinct river.traverse ) from river where river.length = ( select min ( distinct river.length ) from river ) ;
sql-with-vars: select count ( distinct river.traverse ) from river where river.length = ( select min ( distinct river.length ) from river ) ;
